dmca.title: Perfect Paws Asks Google to Remove Boxer Site
dmca.body:
[Private], President
Perfect Paws
[Private] S. Highway [Private]
Pahrump, NV 89048
[Private]@[Private]
[Private]

October 8, 2003

Google, Inc.
Attn: Customer Support. DMCA Complaints
[Private] Parkway
Mountain View, CA 94043

RE: Notice of Copyright Infringement

I am the author of all the content on the website perfectpaws.com. This site has been on the Internet since July 1996 with copyright notice prominently displayed on each page.

The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on:

http://www.perfectpaws.com/pup1.html
http://www.perfectpaws.com/pup2.html
http://www.perfectpaws.com/pup6.html 
http://www.perfectpaws.com/jump.html 
http://www.perfectpaws.com/bite.html 

The following material is infringing the copyrighted work listed above:

http://www.landosboxers.com/boxertips.htm

I have repeatedly contacted the site requesting that they remove the offending material and they have failed to do so. I am requesting that you remove or delist this page or site from your service. The contact information for the site is as follows:

[Private]
[Private]@[Private]
[Private]

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly Infringed.

Please let me know that this has been done. Thank you for your time and consideration.

Signed [Private]
Dated 10/8/03
